verses.text: And the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* us wherewith we shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* it to his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If ye send \w away|strong="H7971"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w send|strong="H7971"\w* it not \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*; but in any \w wise|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* him a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: then ye shall be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*, and it shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to you why his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* is not \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* from you.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, What \add shall be\add* the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* which we shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to him? They \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Five|strong="H2568"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w mice|strong="H5909"\w*, \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* \add was\add* on you all, and on your \w lords|strong="H5633"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft you: Heb. them\f*

Wherefore ye shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of your \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*, and \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of your \w mice|strong="H5909"\w* that \w mar|strong="H7843"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: peradventure he will \w lighten|strong="H7043"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from off you, and from off your \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and from off your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Wherefore then do ye \w harden|strong="H3513"\w* your \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w*, as the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* and \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w hardened|strong="H3513"\w* their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*? when he had wrought \w wonderfully|strong="H5953"\w* among them, did they not let the people \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*?\f + \fr 6.6 \ft wonderfully: or, reproachfully\f*\f + \fr 6.6 \ft the people: Heb. them\f*

Now therefore \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w milch|strong="H5763"\w* \w kine|strong="H6510"\w*, on which there hath \w come|strong="H5927"\w* no \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, and \w tie|strong="H0631"\w* the \w kine|strong="H6510"\w* to the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* their \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* from \w them|strong="H0310"\w*:

And \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* it upon the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*; and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, which ye \w return|strong="H7725"\w* him \add for\add* a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, in a \w coffer|strong="H0712"\w* by the \w side|strong="H6654"\w* thereof; and send it \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, that it may \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.

And \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, if it goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his own \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* to \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, \add then\add* he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* us this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: but if not, then we shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \add it is\add* not his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add that\add* \w smote|strong="H5060"\w* us; it \add was\add* a \w chance|strong="H4745"\w* \add that\add* happened to \w us|strong="H1961"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft he: or, it\f*

¶ And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*; and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w milch|strong="H5763"\w* \w kine|strong="H6510"\w*, and \w tied|strong="H0631"\w* them to the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and shut \w up|strong="H3607"\w* their \w calves|strong="H1121"\w* at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*:

And they \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* upon the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and the \w coffer|strong="H0712"\w* with the \w mice|strong="H5909"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and the \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of their \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*.

And the \w kine|strong="H6510"\w* took the \w straight|strong="H3474"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, \add and\add* went \w along|strong="H1980"\w* the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*, \w lowing|strong="H1600"\w* as they \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, and turned not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*; and the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*.

And \add they of\add* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \add were\add* \w reaping|strong="H7114"\w* their \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*: and they lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

And the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, a \w Beth-shemite|strong="H1030"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* there, where \add there was\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: and they \w clave|strong="H1234"\w* the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* the \w kine|strong="H6510"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* took \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w coffer|strong="H0712"\w* that \add was\add* with it, wherein the \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add were\add*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* on the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And when the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w* which the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \add for\add* a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, for \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, for \w Askelon|strong="H0831"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, for \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, for \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;

And the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w mice|strong="H5909"\w*, \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \add belonging\add* to the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lords|strong="H5633"\w*, \add both\add* of \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and of \w country|strong="H6521"\w* \w villages|strong="H3724"\w*, even unto the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add stone of\add* \w Abel|strong="H0059"\w*, whereon they set \w down|strong="H3240"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add which stone remaineth\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, the \w Beth-shemite|strong="H1030"\w*.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft great…: or, great stone\f*

¶ And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, because they had \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* into the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, even he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w lamented|strong="H0056"\w*, because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* \add many\add* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who is \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? and to whom shall he go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from us?

¶ And they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* have brought \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; come ye \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \add and\add* fetch it \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to you.
